name: Scrap Metal
description: Pieces of rusted or bent metal, useful for crafting.

name: Wood Planks
description: Usable planks of wood, suitable for construction or crafting.

recipe.description: Saw a log into usable planks.

name: Cloth Scrap
description: Torn pieces of fabric, can be used for bandages or other crafts.

name: Duct Tape
description: A roll of strong adhesive tape, incredibly versatile.

name: Nails
description: A handful of metal nails, for construction and crafting.

name: Sharp Glass Shard
description: Jagged pieces of broken glass. Handle with care. Can be used as a crude cutting tool or component.

name: Splintered Wood
description: Sharp fragments of broken wood. Can be hazardous.

name: Metal Ingot
description: A refined bar of generic metal, ready for more complex crafting.

recipe.description: Melt down scrap metal into a usable ingot.

name: Leather Strips
description: Tough strips of cured animal hide.

name: Empty Glass Bottle
description: An empty glass bottle, suitable for holding liquids.

name: Gasoline (Partial Canister)
description: A canister containing some flammable gasoline.

name: Makeshift Armor Plate
description: A crudely fashioned plate of metal, intended for armor.

name: Tomato Seeds
description: A packet of tomato seeds, for planting.

name: Corn Seeds
description: A packet of corn seeds, for planting.

name: Carrot Seeds
description: A packet of carrot seeds, for planting.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A bar of refined iron, ready for forging or further processing.

name: Steel Ingot
description: A bar of steel, stronger and more versatile than iron.

name: Rawhide Leather
description: Untanned animal hide, stiff and durable. Can be used as is or tanned further.

name: Roll of Tanned Leather
description: Processed and preserved animal hide, flexible and ready for crafting.

name: Bolt of Cotton Cloth
description: A standard roll of woven cotton fabric.

name: Bolt of Wool Cloth
description: A standard roll of woven wool fabric, warm and durable.

name: Chunk of Beeswax
description: A lump of natural beeswax, useful for candle making, waterproofing, and polishing.

name: Lye Powder
description: A caustic alkaline substance, a key ingredient in soap making. Handle with care.

name: Rendered Animal Fat (Tallow/Lard)
description: Purified animal fat, used in cooking, soap making, and candle making.

name: Small Uncut Gemstone
description: A rough, unpolished gemstone of modest size.

name: Pouch of Gold Dust
description: Fine particles of gold, can be melted down or used for gilding.

name: Silver Nugget
description: A small, naturally occurring piece of silver.

name: Spool of Copper Wire
description: A spool of insulated copper wire, essential for electrical work and electronics.

name: Section of Rubber Hose
description: A flexible rubber hose, useful for plumbing, fluid transfer, or insulation.

name: Assorted Gears
description: A collection of small to medium-sized metal gears for mechanical devices.

name: Blank Circuit Board (PCB)
description: A blank printed circuit board for mounting electronic components.

name: Bag of Concrete Mix
description: A bag of dry concrete mix, requires water to activate. For construction and repairs.

name: Box of Rivets
description: A box of metal rivets for joining plates of metal or other materials.

name: Can of Fiberglass Resin
description: Liquid resin used with fiberglass cloth to create strong, lightweight composite materials.

name: Roll of Fiberglass Cloth
description: Woven fiberglass fabric used with resin to create composite materials.

name: Wood Stick
description: A sturdy stick, thicker than a twig, thinner than a log. Useful for basic tools or fuel.

name: Wood Log
description: A sizeable section of a tree trunk or large branch. Primary source for planks or heavy wood objects.

name: Strong Plant Fibers
description: Tough fibers harvested from certain plants, suitable for making cordage or rough fabric.

name: Sharp Stone Fragment
description: A piece of stone with a naturally sharp edge, perhaps from flint or obsidian. Useful as a crude cutting tool or arrowhead.

name: Small Raw Animal Hide
description: The untreated skin of a small animal. Needs to be processed for leather.

name: Animal Sinew
description: Dried animal tendon, very strong. Can be used as cord or bowstring.

name: Feather
description: A bird feather, useful for fletching arrows or decoration.

name: Lump of Clay
description: Moist clay, suitable for pottery or making molds.

name: Pile of Sand
description: Common sand, useful for construction (concrete), glassmaking, or creating molds.

name: Charcoal Bits
description: Small pieces of charred wood. Useful as fuel, for drawing, or as a component in black powder.

recipe.description: Slowly burn wood in a low-oxygen environment to create charcoal.

name: Basic Gunpowder
description: A crude mixture of sulfur, charcoal, and saltpeter. The fundamental component for many early firearms and explosives.

recipe.description: Mix base chemicals to create gunpowder.

name: Small Metal Bits
description: Tiny fragments of metal, smaller than general scrap. Good for shrapnel or very fine work.

name: Small Pistol Brass Casing
description: An empty brass casing for small caliber pistol ammunition (e.g., 9mm, .38 Spl).

name: Large Pistol Brass Casing
description: An empty brass casing for large caliber pistol ammunition (e.g., .45 ACP, .44 Mag).

name: Small Rifle Brass Casing
description: An empty brass casing for small caliber rifle ammunition (e.g., 5.56mm).

name: Medium Rifle Brass Casing
description: An empty brass casing for medium caliber rifle ammunition (e.g., 7.62mm).

name: Large Rifle Brass Casing
description: An empty brass casing for large caliber rifle ammunition (e.g., .50 BMG).

name: 12-Gauge Shotshell Hull
description: An empty plastic or paper hull for a 12-gauge shotgun shell.

name: 10-Gauge Shotshell Hull
description: An empty plastic or paper hull for a 10-gauge shotgun shell.

name: Small Pistol Primer
description: A small primer for pistol ammunition.

name: Large Pistol Primer
description: A large primer for pistol ammunition.

name: Small Rifle Primer
description: A small primer for rifle ammunition.

name: Large Rifle Primer
description: A large primer for rifle ammunition.

name: Shotgun Primer
description: A primer for shotgun shells.

name: 9mm Bullet Projectile
description: A lead projectile for 9mm ammunition.

name: 10mm Bullet Projectile
description: A lead projectile for 10mm ammunition.

name: .45 Caliber Bullet Projectile
description: A lead projectile for .45 caliber ammunition.

name: .50 Caliber Pistol Bullet Projectile
description: A large lead projectile for .50 caliber pistol ammunition (e.g., .50AE).

name: .22 Caliber Bullet Projectile
description: A small lead projectile for .22 caliber ammunition.

name: 5.56mm Bullet Projectile
description: A lead and copper projectile for 5.56mm rifle ammunition.

name: 7.62mm Bullet Projectile
description: A lead and copper projectile for 7.62mm rifle ammunition.

name: .50 BMG Bullet Projectile
description: A very large lead and copper projectile for .50 BMG ammunition.

name: Lead Buckshot Pellets
description: A measure of lead pellets for crafting buckshot shells.

name: Shotgun Wad
description: A plastic or fiber wad used in shotgun shells to separate the powder from the shot.

name: Wooden Arrow Shaft
description: A straight wooden shaft, ready for an arrowhead and fletching.

name: Sturdy Wooden Bolt Shaft
description: A thicker, sturdier wooden shaft for crossbow bolts.

name: Crude Stone Arrowhead
description: A simply knapped stone arrowhead.

name: Basic Metal Arrowhead
description: A simple arrowhead forged from metal.

name: Basic Metal Bolt Head
description: A simple metal head for a crossbow bolt.

name: Generic Explosive Compound (Type B)
description: A moderately powerful explosive compound, more refined than basic gunpowder. For grenades or specialized charges.

name: 40mm Grenade Casing (Metal)
description: A metal casing for a 40mm grenade round.

name: Timed/Impact Grenade Fuze Assembly
description: A mechanical or electronic fuze for grenades, allowing timed or impact detonation.

name: Simple Plant Fiber Thread
description: Thread spun from strong plant fibers. Suitable for basic sewing.

name: Basic Plant Fiber Cordage
description: Strong cordage made from twisted plant fibers. Useful for binding or simple constructions.

recipe.description: Twist plant fibers or simple thread into stronger cordage.

name: Rough Fiber Cloth Sheet
description: A coarsely woven sheet of cloth made from plant fibers. Not very comfortable, but functional.

recipe.description: Weave plant fibers or thread into a rough sheet of cloth.

name: Small Cured Leather Piece
description: A small piece of animal hide that has undergone basic curing. Stiffer than tanned leather.

recipe.description: Cure a small raw hide using simple tannins or smoke.

name: Thin Metal Rod
description: A thin rod of metal, useful for various small fabrications.

recipe.description: Fashion thin rods from scrap metal.

name: Thin Metal Sheet
description: A thin sheet of pliable metal. Can be cut or shaped.

recipe.description: Hammer scrap metal or an ingot into a thin sheet.

name: Stiff Metal Wire
description: A length of stiff metal wire, good for lockpicks or structural elements.

recipe.description: Draw out scrap metal into stiff wire.

name: Processed Plastic Scrap
description: Cleaned and somewhat uniform pieces of plastic, ready for melting or molding.

recipe.description: Clean and process raw plastic junk into usable scrap.

name: Basic LED
description: A simple Light Emitting Diode. Needs power to light up.

name: Thin Insulated Wire
description: A short length of thin, insulated copper wire for electronics.

name: Small Battery Cell
description: A common small battery cell (e.g., AA, AAA). Provides power for small devices.

name: Small Metal Spring
description: A small coiled metal spring, for mechanisms.

name: Small Metal Rivet
description: A small metal rivet for fastening light materials.

name: Small Buckle (Metal/Plastic)
description: A small buckle for straps, could be metal or sturdy plastic.

name: Crude Glass Lens
description: A roughly shaped piece of glass that can magnify or focus light, albeit poorly.

name: Sulfur Powder
description: Yellow sulfur powder, a key chemical reagent.

name: Saltpeter (Potassium Nitrate)
description: Potassium nitrate powder, an oxidizer used in gunpowder and fertilizers.

name: Simple Bark Tannin
description: A powder or solution derived from tree bark, used for basic leather curing.

name: Basic Wick
description: A short length of twisted cloth or fiber that can serve as a wick for a candle or simple lamp.

name: Herbal Antiseptic Pulp
description: A pulp made from specific medicinal herbs, possessing mild antiseptic qualities.

name: Basic Adhesive Paste
description: A sticky paste made from natural ingredients, for light adhesion.

name: Simple Mechanical Parts
description: A small collection of basic gears, levers, and linkages made from scrap.

recipe.description: Assemble simple mechanical components from scrap metal and small bits.

name: Rubber Strips/Chunks
description: Pieces of rubber salvaged from tires or other sources. Useful for padding or creating elastic parts.

recipe.description: Cut an old tire into usable rubber strips or chunks.

name: Old Tire
description: A worn-out vehicle tire. Can be salvaged for rubber or burned (badly).

name: Small Tool-Grade Steel Ingot
description: A small ingot of steel, suitable for forging basic tool heads.

name: Simple Wooden Tool Handle
description: A roughly shaped wooden handle for basic tools.

recipe.description: Carve a simple tool handle from a piece of wood.

name: Fine Cotton Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of soft, finely woven cotton fabric.

name: Fine Wool Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of soft, warm, finely woven wool fabric.

name: Sturdy Canvas Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of durable, heavy-duty canvas fabric.

name: Tough Nylon Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of resilient nylon fabric, resistant to tearing and water.

name: Kevlar Ballistic Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of woven Kevlar, offering excellent protection against projectiles and shrapnel.

name: Rough Burlap Fabric Sheet
description: A sheet of coarse burlap fabric, good for sacks or very rustic items.

name: Thick Cured Leather Hide
description: A large, thick piece of animal hide that has been cured. Sturdy and suitable for armor or heavy goods.

name: Medium Tanned Leather Hide
description: A versatile piece of tanned leather, suitable for clothing, bags, and lighter armor.

name: Foam Padding Sheet
description: A sheet of soft foam, useful for padding armor or creating comfortable items.

name: Small Device Plastic Casing
description: A molded plastic casing suitable for small electronic devices or tools.

name: Medium Device Plastic Casing
description: A molded plastic casing for medium-sized electronics or equipment.

name: Small Device Metal Casing
description: A sturdy metal casing for small, rugged devices.

name: Medium Device Metal Casing
description: A robust metal casing for medium-sized equipment requiring durability.

name: Simple Populated Circuit Board
description: A small circuit board with a few basic electronic components pre-soldered.

name: Nichrome Heating Element Wire
description: A length of nichrome wire, designed to heat up when electricity passes through it.

name: Small Electric Motor
description: A compact electric motor for powering small mechanical devices.

name: Basic Radio Antenna
description: A simple antenna for transmitting or receiving radio signals.

name: Advanced Fuze Mechanism
description: A more complex fuze mechanism for specialized explosives, potentially with electronic components.

name: Vehicle Grade Steel Plate
description: A thick, heavy steel plate specifically manufactured for vehicle armor.

name: Small Engine Block (Cast)
description: The main structure of a small engine, cast from metal.

name: Piston Set for Small Engine
description: A set of pistons and connecting rods for a small internal combustion engine.

name: Crankshaft for Small Engine
description: A forged or cast crankshaft for a small engine.

name: Rubber Sheet (Tire Tread)
description: A thick sheet of rubber, often with tread patterns, salvaged from tires. Good for durable surfaces or patches.

name: Small Optical Grade Glass Lens
description: A precisely ground glass lens for use in scopes or other optical devices.

name: Basic Memory Chip
description: A small integrated circuit for storing data in electronic devices.

name: Basic Sensor Module
description: A generic sensor module for detecting light, motion, or other simple environmental factors.

name: Plastic Junk
description: Miscellaneous broken or discarded plastic items (e.g., broken toys, bottle caps, casings). Needs processing.

name: Steel Needle
description: A small, sharp steel needle for sewing.

recipe.description: Fashion a steel needle from stiff wire.

name: Heavy Steel Needle
description: A larger, stronger steel needle for sewing tough materials like canvas or leather.

recipe.description: Fashion a heavy-duty steel needle.

name: Strong Synthetic Thread
description: Durable thread made from synthetic fibers, suitable for heavy-duty sewing (e.g., nylon, polyester).

recipe.description: Process plastic scrap into strong synthetic thread.

name: Green Pigment Leaves
description: Leaves rich in green pigment, can be processed into dye.

name: Brown Pigment Bark
description: Tree bark rich in brown pigment, can be processed into dye.

name: Natural Green Dye
description: A green dye extracted from plant matter.

recipe.description: Extract green dye from leaves.

name: Natural Brown Dye
description: A brown dye extracted from tree bark.

recipe.description: Extract brown dye from tree bark.

name: Strong Netting
description: A durable netting woven from strong cordage.

recipe.description: Weave strong cordage into a durable net.

name: Clean Water (Unit)
description: A generic unit of clean, potable water for crafting or drinking.

name: Large Suitable Rock
description: A large, solid piece of rock that can be worked into blocks or other shapes.

name: Hewn Stone Block
description: A roughly shaped block of stone, suitable for construction.

recipe.description: Shape a large rock into a usable stone block.

name: Sturdy Metal Sheet
description: A relatively thick and sturdy sheet of metal, suitable for construction or armor.

recipe.description: Forge and flatten metal ingots into sturdy sheets.

name: Set of Bolts and Nuts
description: A set of metal bolts and matching nuts for fastening.

recipe.description: Manufacture bolts and nuts from metal rods.

name: Basic Tarp
description: A sheet of moderately waterproof material, useful for shelter or collecting water.

recipe.description: Fashion a basic tarp from processed plastic or heavy fabric treated for water resistance.

name: Simple Wooden Splint
description: Two flat pieces of wood and some cloth strips, for immobilizing a limb.

recipe.description: Fashion a simple splint from wood sticks and cloth.

name: Iodine Crystals
description: Purified iodine crystals, a potent antiseptic and water purification agent. Handle with care.
warning: Toxic if ingested directly in quantity

name: Comfrey Leaves
description: The leaves of the comfrey plant, known for their healing properties.

name: Fine Animal Hide
description: A thin, carefully prepared animal hide, suitable for making parchment or fine leather items.

name: Basic Lime Solution
description: A caustic solution made from lye or crushed lime, used for dehairing hides.

name: Small Metal Hook
description: A small, sharpened metal hook, suitable for fishing.

name: Thick Plexiglass Sheet
description: A thick, transparent sheet of acrylic (plexiglass), offering some impact resistance.

name: Vehicle Grade Mechanical Parts
description: Robust mechanical components like axles, bearings, and linkages, suitable for vehicle construction.

recipe.description: Manufacture heavy-duty mechanical parts for vehicles.

name: V4 Engine Parts Kit
description: A kit of precision-machined components for assembling a V4 engine (block, pistons, crankshaft, heads, etc.).

name: Long Wooden Shaft
description: A long, straight, and sturdy wooden shaft, suitable for spears or javelins.

name: Hand Grenade Metal Casing
description: A hollow metal casing for a hand grenade, designed to fragment.

name: Safety Pin and Pull Ring Assembly
description: A safety pin and pull ring assembly for a grenade fuze.

name: Small Metal Blade Blank
description: A piece of metal forged and roughly shaped into a small blade, needs sharpening and a handle.

name: Wooden Handle Scales (Pair)
description: Two shaped pieces of wood for making a knife handle.

name: Large Electric Motor
description: A powerful electric motor suitable for heavy machinery.

recipe.description: Assemble a large electric motor from industrial components.

name: Large Metal Blade Blank
description: A piece of metal forged and roughly shaped into a large blade for a machete or short sword.
